alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 3:01AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Much Colder Temperatures, Wind, and Snow on the Way... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Below normal temperatures, gusty north wind 15 to 30 mph, and eventual snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Northern Johnson County, including Buffalo. * WHEN...A cold front moves through early this afternoon. Much colder temperatures and gusty north wind follow. Snow arrives late tonight and persists through Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Daytime highs today only reach the lower to mid 40s by midday, with falling temperatures and gusty north wind during the afternoon. The snow is likely to be heaviest between 6AM and 3PM Thursday. Thursday highs only climb into the upper 20s.
